news_header: Over a million Syrians displaced since December; many have returned.
news_original_title: YK:n mukaan Syyriaan on palannut jo 280 000 pakolaista ulkomailta
news_text: More than a million Syrians have been displaced since the fall of the Bashar Al-Assad regime last December, with about 280,000 returning. UNHCR's Filippo Grand emphasized the need for Syria's recovery to prevent further emigration. Islamist rebels claim to respect minority rights now. The war, which began in 2011, has resulted in over half a million deaths and millions displaced.
